story.title: Our Story
story.p1: It all started at work. What at first seemed like innocent small talk soon turned into a lifetime of sharing sunsets, mountain peaks – and also game nights full of board games and flying discs on the disc golf course.
story.p2: From our first hike to the countless memories we've collected along the way, every step naturally led us here. We alternated mountain trails with game boards, fairways with the living room, and found that it doesn't matter if we're climbing a peak, fighting for victory during game night, or looking for a disc in the bushes.
story.p3: We grew together, supported our dreams, and realized that life's greatest adventures are the ones we take hand in hand.
story.quote: Home isn't a place, it's a person. And together we've found our way home.

events.groupPhoto: Group photo in front of the church

location.title: The Location
location.description: Our wedding will take place in the Trenčianska Teplá. Both the ceremony and reception are centrally located, making it easy to navigate between venues.
location.parking: Parking is available directly at the ATRIUM reception venue. Additionally, both arranged accommodations offer their own private parking spaces.
location.quote: We can't wait to see you there!

accommodation.title: Where to Stay
accommodation.subtitle: We have reserved all rooms for our family from Moravia at the reception venue and the nearby Pension Conti. For other guests, we recommend checking Dubno Eat & Sleep. A shuttle service will be available after the wedding. If we can help you with anything, just let us know — we'd be happy to assist.

hotels.name: Penzión ATRIUM
hotels.description: Accommodation directly at the reception venue.

hotels.name: Penzión Conti
hotels.description: Cozy guest house near the center.

hotels.name: Dubno Eat & Sleep
hotels.description: One of the newest and most modern hotels in the nearby area.

gifts.title: Gifts
gifts.p1: The most important thing to us is that you can join us for our wedding. Your presence is the greatest gift we could ask for.
gifts.p2: However, if you wish to honor us with a gift, a contribution towards our honeymoon adventures or our future home together would be warmly appreciated.

footer.thanks: Thank you for being part of our story. We can't wait to celebrate this special day with all of our favorite people.
footer.madeWith: Made with love for our special day
